Structs/CPCFontMetrics.html#/s:10CPCalen.name: metrics(for:)
Structs/CPCFontMetrics.html#/s:10CPCalen.abstract: Creates new CPCFontMetricsProtocol instance that scales values according to a specific text style.

Other Structs.html#/s:10CPCalendar25CPCD.name: CPCDefaultDayCellRenderer
Other Structs.html#/s:10CPCalendar25CPCD.abstract: Default implementation of CPCDayCellRenderer. Does not override any of CPCDayCellRenderer‘s implementations.

Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.name: scaledValue(_:)
Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.abstract: Get an arbitrary scaled value for current content size category.

Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.name: scaledValue(_:for:)
Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.abstract: Get an arbitrary scaled value for a given contentSizeCategory.

Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.name: scaledInsets(_:)
Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.abstract: Get insets, scaled for current content size category.

Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.name: scaledFont(_:)
Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html#/s.abstract: Get font, scaled for current content size category.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolImpl.html.name: symbolKeyPaths
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolImpl.html.abstract: KeyPaths of a Calendar instance that should be used to retrieve non-standalone symbols.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolImpl.html.name: standaloneSymbolKeyPaths
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolImpl.html.abstract: KeyPaths of a Calendar instance that should be used to retrieve standalone symbols.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolImpl.html.name: unitOrdinalValue
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolImpl.html.abstract: Index that should be used to fetch a localized symbol.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.name: cachedElement(at:)
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.abstract: Query calendar units cache for subunit of a compound calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.name: cacheElement(_:for:)
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.abstract: Cache a calendar subunit for specified position in this unit.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.name: cachedIndex(of:)
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.abstract: Query calendar units cache for position of subunit in this one.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.name: cacheIndex(_:for:)
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.abstract: Cache position of a subunit inside this one.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.name: indices(for:using:)
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.abstract: Calculate all possible indices for a given compound unit.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.name: subscript(ordinal:)
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html#/.abstract: Returns a subunit at nth place using zero-based indexes.

Protocols/ExpressibleByDateComponents.ht.name: requiredComponents
Protocols/ExpressibleByDateComponents.ht.abstract: Collection of Calendar.Components that are required for proper initialization of this type’s instances.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.name: BackedType
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.abstract: Type for which this one serves as a backing storage.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.name: init(containing:calendar:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.abstract: Creates a new storage for a calendar unit that contains a specific date.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.name: startDate(using:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.abstract: Get an earliest date that is contained in a backed calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.name: distance(to:using:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.abstract: Calculate distance between this value and other one, measured in the unit’s durations.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.name: advanced(by:using:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.abstract: Calculate a backing value with specific distance from represented one.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: UnitBackingType
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Type serving as a storage for calendar unit info.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: representedUnit
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Calendar unit that is represented by this model type.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: calendar
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Calendar that is used to calculate unit’s start an end dates and related units.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: calendarWrapper
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Unit’s calendar that is wrapped in CalendarWrapper object for performance reasons.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: backingValue
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Raw value of calendar unit, e.g. month and year values for CPCMonth.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: init(containing:calendar:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Creates a new calendar unit that contains a given date according to supplied wrapped calendar.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: init(containing:timeZone:calendar:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Creates a new calendar unit that contains a given date according to supplied calendar.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: init(containing:timeZone:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Creates a new calendar unit that contains a given date according to system calendar.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: init(containing:timeZone:calendarIdentifier:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Creates a new calendar unit that contains a given date according to calendar with supplied identifier.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: cachedDistance(to:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Query calendar units cache for distance between two units.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: cacheDistance(_:to:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Cache a distance between two calendar units.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: cachedAdvancedUnit(by:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Query calendar units cache for a unit that has specific distance from this one.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: cacheUnitValue(_:advancedBy:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Cache a calendar unit that has specific distance from this one.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.name: init(containing:calendar:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Creates a new calendar unit that contains a given date according to supplied calendar.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html.name: CPCCalendarUnit
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnit.html.abstract: Common protocol implementing most of CPCDay, CPCWeek, CPCMonth and CPCYear functionality.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.name: CPCCalendarUnitBackingType
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitBackingType.htm.abstract: Common protocol for types that are suitable as backing storage of CPCCalendarUnit instances.

Protocols/ExpressibleByDateComponents.ht.name: ExpressibleByDateComponents
Protocols/ExpressibleByDateComponents.ht.abstract: Expresses that a type can be initialized using DateComponents.

Protocols/DateComponentsConvertible.html.name: DateComponentsConvertible
Protocols/DateComponentsConvertible.html.abstract: Expresses that a type can be represented as DateComponents.

Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html.name: CPCCompoundCalendarUnit
Protocols/CPCCompoundCalendarUnit.html.abstract: Protocol, implementing a collection of smaller units that are contained in this calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html.name: CPCFontMetricsProtocol
Protocols/CPCFontMetricsProtocol.html.abstract: Protocol that hides Dynamic Font implementation differences between iOS 10 and iOS 11+.

Other Functions.html#/s:10CPCalendar29re.name: resultingCalendarForOperation(for:_:)
Other Functions.html#/s:10CPCalendar29re.abstract: Test equivalence of units’ calendars and abort if they differ.

Classes/CPCCalendarWrapper.html.name: CPCCalendarWrapper
Classes/CPCCalendarWrapper.html.abstract: Wraps a Calendar instance into a reference type to enable short-circuit equality evaluation using identity operator.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:10C.name: drawCell(in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:10C.abstract: Fully renders content of cell, representing a specific day. Default implementation calls drawCellBackground (in:) and drawCellTitle (in:), in that order.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:10C.name: drawCellBackground(in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:10C.abstract: Renders background of a day cell. Default implementation calls drawCellBackground (state:color:frame:in:) with corresponding values of context.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:10C.name: drawCellTitle(in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:10C.abstract: Renders title of a day cell. Default implementation calls drawCellTitle (title:attributes:frame:in:) with corresponding values of context.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:10C.name: drawCellBackground(state:color:frame:in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:10C.abstract: Default implementation of day cell background drawing. Fills frame of context with color if state != CPCDayCellState.normal.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:10C.name: drawCellTitle(title:attributes:frame:in:)
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html#/s:10C.abstract: Default implementation of day cell title drawing. Renders title with attributes in frame of context.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderingContext.htm.name: graphicsContext
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderingContext.htm.abstract: Graphical context that should be used for custom drawing.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderingContext.htm.name: day
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderingContext.htm.abstract: Day that is represented by the cell.

Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..name: normal
Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..abstract: Normal state of a day cell (not selected, highlighted or disabled).

Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..name: highlighted
Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..abstract: Highlighted state of a cell (current user touch is inside cell’s bounds).

Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..name: selected
Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..abstract: Selected state of a cell (cell is part of current selection).

Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..name: BackgroundState
Structs/CPCDayCellState/BackgroundState..abstract: State of a cell that is assigned due to user actions.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.name: isToday
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.abstract: State part, indicating that cell is rendering current day.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.name: init(backgroundState:isToday:)
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.abstract: Creates a new cell state from state items.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.name: normal
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.abstract: Normal state of a cell that renders any day except current.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.name: highlighted
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.abstract: Highlighted state of a cell that renders any day except current.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.name: selected
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.abstract: Selected state of a cell that renders any day except current.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.name: today
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.abstract: Normal state of a cell that renders current day.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.name: cState
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.abstract: CPCDayCellState Objective C value, equivalent to this CPCDayCellState value.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.name: init(_:)
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.abstract: Creates new CPCDayCellState equivalent to a CPCDayCellState Objective C value.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.name: allCases
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html#/s:10CPCale.abstract: Collection of all values that CPCDayCellState can be equal to.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.name: short
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Short title format: one-digit month number and full year.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.name: medium
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Medium title format: two-digit zero-padded month number and full year.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.name: long
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Long title format: abbreviated month name and full year.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.name: full
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Full title format: full month name and full year.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.name: default
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Default month title format, which is used when no format was explicitly set.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.name: customTemplate(_:locale:)
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Create a new month title format using date format template.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.name: custom(_:)
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Create a new month title format using exact date format.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.name: init(stringLiteral:)
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Creates a new month title format from a string literal.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.name: init(templateValue:locale:)
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Create a new month title format using date format template.

Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html.name: CPCViewTitleStyle
Structs/CPCViewTitleStyle.html.abstract: A value that holds information about formatting month titles.

Structs/CPCDayCellState.html.name: CPCDayCellState
Structs/CPCDayCellState.html.abstract: State of a single cell for a specific day.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderingContext.htm.name: CPCDayCellRenderingContext
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderingContext.htm.abstract: A set of methods that provide contextual information for drawing a single day cell in a month view.

Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html.name: CPCDayCellRenderer
Protocols/CPCDayCellRenderer.html.abstract: A type that is able to render a cell of a month view, representing an arbitrary day.

Protocols/CPCFixedAspectRatioView.html#/.name: aspectRatioComponents(for:)
Protocols/CPCFixedAspectRatioView.html#/.abstract: Returns coefficients of equation ViewHeight = K x ViewWidth + C to fit content.

Structs/CPCYear.html#/s:10CPCalendar7CPC.name: year
Structs/CPCYear.html#/s:10CPCalendar7CPC.abstract: Number of year represented by this value.

Structs/CPCYear.html#/s:10CPCalendar7CPC.name: init(yearsSinceNow:)
Structs/CPCYear.html#/s:10CPCalendar7CPC.abstract: Create a new value, corresponding to a year in the future or past.

Structs/CPCMonth.html#/s:10CPCalendar8CP.name: init(monthsSinceNow:)
Structs/CPCMonth.html#/s:10CPCalendar8CP.abstract: Create a new value, corresponding to a month in the future or past.

Structs/CPCWeek.html#/s:10CPCalendar7CPC.name: init(weeksSinceNow:)
Structs/CPCWeek.html#/s:10CPCalendar7CPC.abstract: Create a new value, corresponding to a week in the future or past.

Structs/CPCDay.html#/s:10CPCalendar6CPCD.name: isWeekend
Structs/CPCDay.html#/s:10CPCalendar6CPCD.abstract: Indicates whether represented day belongs to weekend.

Structs/CPCDay.html#/s:10CPCalendar6CPCD.name: init(daysSinceNow:)
Structs/CPCDay.html#/s:10CPCalendar6CPCD.abstract: Create a new value, corresponding to a day in the future or past.

Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.name: normal
Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.abstract: Full localized name of a calendar unit.

Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.name: short
Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.abstract: Shortened localized name of calendar unit. Usually consists of just several letters.

Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.name: veryShort
Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.abstract: The very shortest localized name for a calendar unit. Usually contains just a single letter.

Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.name: default
Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html#/s.abstract: Default symbol style that is used when no specific style is requested.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.name: symbol(style:standalone:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.abstract: Get a localized name of a calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.name: symbol()
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.abstract: Get a localized name of a calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.name: symbol(standalone:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.abstract: Get a localized name of a calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.name: symbol(style:)
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html#/s:.abstract: Get a localized name of a calendar unit.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: init(_:)
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Creates a new date interval that is equivalent to another one.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: init(_:)
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Creates a new date interval that is equivalent to another one.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: clamped(to:)
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Returns a copy of this date interval clamped to the given limiting date interval.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: clamped(to:)
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Returns a copy of this date interval clamped to the given limiting date interval.

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.name: start
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Earliest date that is included in date interval.

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.name: end
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Earliest date that is not included in date interval and is later than start (analogous to Range <Date>.upperBound).

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.name: duration
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Duration of date interval. Default implementation returns self.end.timeIntervalSice (self.start).

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.name: contains(_:)
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this date interval is fully contained or is equal to the given range.

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.name: contains(_:)
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether this date interval is fully contained or is equal to the given range.

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.name: prev
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Previous interval (an interval that has the same duration and ends when this interval starts).

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.name: next
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html#/s:10CPCa.abstract: Next interval (an interval that has the same duration and starts when this interval ends).

Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html.name: CPCDateInterval
Protocols/CPCDateInterval.html.abstract: Common protocol for types representing an arbitrary range of dates.

Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.name: CPCDateIntervalInitializable
Protocols/CPCDateIntervalInitializable.h.abstract: Common protocol for types that can be initialized with a date interval.

Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html.name: CPCCalendarUnitSymbol
Protocols/CPCCalendarUnitSymbol.html.abstract: Calendar unit that has a localizable symbol in addition to an integer value.

Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html.name: CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle
Enums/CPCCalendarUnitSymbolStyle.html.abstract: Represents style of a localized string representing a calendar unit.

Structs/CPCDay.html.name: CPCDay
Structs/CPCDay.html.abstract: Calendar unit that repsesents a single day.

Other Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
